definitions.definition: A pattern, a way of doing something, especially  a pattern of thought, a system of beliefs, a conceptual framework.

parsedExamples.example: Thomas Kuhn's landmark “The Structure of Scientific Revolutions” got people talking about paradigm shifts, to the point the word itself now suggests an incomplete or biased perspective.
